title.rendered: AFN REAR STEP BAR TO SUIT VW AMAROK COMPATIBLE WITH V6 MODELS (SLIMLINE NO. PLATE ONLY)

content.rendered:
AFN Rear Step Bar to suit VW Amarok, is available now at Automax 4×4!

AFN Rear Step Bar to suit VW Amarok is compatible with V6 models (slimline No. plate only), and includes;

  • Steel Tube Protection To Sides
  • Checkered Aluminum Step Plate
  • Rated Recovery Points
  • Hi-Lift Jack Points
  • Matte Black Powder Coated (Tube/Bar ONLY)

To browse the full range of 4×4 accessories to suit your VW Amarok click here!

For more 4×4 inspiration follow us on Instagram and Facebook

excerpt.rendered: AFN rear step bar to suit your VW Amarok (compatible with V6 models, slimline No. plate only) is available now in store or online at Automax 4×4!
